title: Plot Point - The betrayal at the Conclave
content: Valerius' death was no accident. He discovered that senior alchemists were mass-producing catalyst to weaponize elemental magic. His journal reveals a coded warning: 'They trade life for power.' Must show Elara finding this evidence in Chapter 3. Foreshadowing hint: Conclave's 'accident reports' always occur during lunar eclipses.
